name: Sales Order Updates
processScenario: Change Sales Inquiry details in ERP system
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually change sales required delivery date and order quantity in sales inquiry in ERP system
automationScope: By using BluePrism, peform the task automatically.

name: Outbound Delivery Updates
processScenario: Change Outbound delivery details in ERP system
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually change the 'Delivery quantity' and 'Planned goods movement date' of Outbound delivery in ERP system
automationScope: By using BluePrism, peform the task automatically.

name: Bad Debt Provisioning and Reconciliation
processScenario: Create bad debt provision & approvals, Post appropriate journals, Reconcile un-billed revenue, Create & post appropriate journals
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually  Create bad debt provision & approvals, Post appropriate journals, Reconcile un-billed revenue, Create & post appropriate journals
automationScope: By using BluePrism, peform the task automatically.

name: E mail Alert for Pending GR
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually check the pending goods receipt details and send the remainder e-mail for all the pending items
automationScope: By using BluePrism, peform the task automatically.

name: Core Interface Monitoring
processScenario: Monitor CIF Queue thresholds periodically to prevent choking
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually monitor the CIF queue thresholds periodically to prevent choking
automationScope: Using a Python script, automatically monitor the CIF queue thresholds periodically to prevent choking

name: Backup Monitoring
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually login into the database server and check the running status of db backup job. If the last run time is more than 60 mins then send an email to the respective team about the job hault status
automationScope: Using a Python script, automatically monitor the CIF queue thresholds periodically to prevent choking

name: Message & Channel Monitoring
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually upload the master data from a Non-SAP system using the Legacy System Migration Workbench (LSMW) into SAP system
automationScope: Peform the task automatically. By using Automtion Anywhere

name: Purchase Order Price Update
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually identify the Pricing changes from Excel sheet and update the changes in the respective Purchase Order. Also, update the contract price and the "validity from date"
automationScope: Peform the task automatically. By using Automtion Anywhere

name: Mass PO Update
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually perform mass updation/closure/deletion of the Purchase Orders
automationScope: Peform the task automatically. By using Automtion Anywhere

name: GR IR Reconciliation
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually download the data and reconcile the GR(goods receipt)/ & IR(Invoice receipt) amount and update the status
automationScope: Automatically download the Transaction Detais, GR/IR reports by using Automation Anywhere.

name: Outstanding PO Alerts to Vendors
processScenario: Notify Vendors on outstanding purchase orders
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually check the outstanding/open purchase orders in the ERP system and email the vendors about the outstanding purchase orders with attaching the PO in pdf format
automationScope: Peform the task automatically. By using Automtion Anywhere

name: Release Held POs
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually check the purchases orders that are on hold due to past dues or other reasons will have to be validated and Release the orders or provide the required information to the Representative or Manager for approval
automationScope: Automatically check the purchases orders that are on hold due to past dues or other reasons will have to be validated and Release the orders or provide the required information to the Representative or Manager for approval

name: Create New Vendor
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually validate new vendor request and if valid, create new vendor in ERP system
automationScope: Automatically validate new vendor request and if valid, create new vendor in ERP system by using BluePrism

name: Block/Unblock Vendor
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually block/unblock the vendors in the ERP system
automationScope: Automatically block/unblock the vendors in the ERP system by using Blue Prism

name: PO Short Closure
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually Short Close the Purchase Order by checking the delivery completion Flag
automationScope: Automatically short close the purchase orders by checking the delivery completion Flag  with help of UIPath

name: SO Creation via Excel
processScenario: Convert Distributors (Excel) Orders to Sales Order
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually convert the stockist/distributor's purchase order which is in Excel format to sale order
automationScope: Automatically convert the distributor's purchase order which is in Excel format to sale order with UIPath

name: Customer Invoice Clearing w.r.t Remittance Advice
processScenario: Automate Customer Invoice Clearing wrt Remittance advice
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually compare the PDF remittance advice from retailer and clear invoices
automationScope: Automatically compare the PDF remittance advice from retailer and clear invoices with UIPath

name: Inbound Deliver Date Update
processScenario: Updation of Goods arrival date in Inbound delivery
summaryAsIsProcess: Manual sales order change in SAP ECC system
automationScope: Bot receives order data in email attachment

name: Number Range Threshold Alert
processScenario: Number range failure notification email automation
summaryAsIsProcess: Any billing document type number range exhaustion manually need to monitored and maintained after exhaustion
automationScope: Send the alert automatically befor exhausting of number range

name: Material Master Creation
summaryAsIsProcess: Manually Extract the data from input excel and punch the data in SAP material management module to introduce new material in SAP
automationScope: Automatically Extract the data from input excel and punch the data in SAP MM module using Automation Anywhere

name: Release Blocked EDI Orders
summaryAsIsProcess: EDI order generated are blocked(Delivery block 07) on creation. Orders blocks to be released after pricing validation checks or to be sent for manual verification in case of validation failure.
automationScope: Perform the task automatically by using Automation Anywhere
